RandomCoverage.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  * \file RandomCoverage.cpp
00003  * \brief Coverage test for %RandomLib
00004  *
00005  * Compile/link with, e.g.,\n
00006  * g++ -I../include -O2 -funroll-loops
00007  *   -o RandomCoverage RandomCoverage.cpp ../src/Random.cpp\n
00008  * ./RandomCoverage
00009  *
00010  * This executes nearly all of the public functions in %RandomLib.  This is
00011  * important, since it allows the compiler to check the code which appears in
00012  * header files.  It also shows how templated functions can be invoked.
00013  *
00014  * $Id: b9cf917a50887ca7d15e038d9f62417b39466ab7 $
00015  *
00016  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2006-2012) <charles@karney.com> and licensed
00017  * under the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00018  * http://randomlib.sourceforge.net/
00019  **********************************************************************/
00020 
00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <sstream>
00025 #include <RandomLib/Random.hpp>
00026 #include <RandomLib/NormalDistribution.hpp>
00027 #include <RandomLib/ExponentialDistribution.hpp>
00028 #include <RandomLib/RandomSelect.hpp>
00029 #include <RandomLib/LeadingZeros.hpp>
00030 #include <RandomLib/ExponentialProb.hpp>
00031 #include <RandomLib/RandomNumber.hpp>
00032 #include <RandomLib/ExactExponential.hpp>
00033 #include <RandomLib/ExactNormal.hpp>
00034 #include <RandomLib/ExactPower.hpp>
00035 #include <RandomLib/InversePiProb.hpp>
00036 #include <RandomLib/InverseEProb.hpp>
00037 
00038 #define repeat for (int i = 0; i < 1000; ++i)
00039 
00040 void coverage32() {
00041   typedef RandomLib::SRandom32 Random;
00042   {
00043     // Setting and examing the seed + seed management
00044     std::vector<unsigned long> v(Random::SeedVector());
00045     unsigned long w = Random::SeedWord();
00046     std::string s(Random::VectorToString(v));
00047     { Random r(v); }
00048     { Random r(v.begin(), v.end()); }
00049     int a[] = {1, 2, 3, 4};
00050     { Random r(a, a + 4); }
00051     { Random r(w); }
00052     { Random r(s); }
00053     { Random r; }
00054     Random r(0);
00055     r.Reseed(v);
00056     r.Reseed(v.begin(), v.end());
00057     r.Reseed(w);
00058     r.Reseed(s);
00059     r.Reseed();
00060     v = r.Seed();
00061     s = r.SeedString();
00062     r.Reseed(Random::VectorToString(v));
00063     r.Reseed(Random::StringToVector(s));
00064   }
00065   Random r;
00066   {
00067     // Functions returning random integers
00068     repeat r();
00069     repeat r.Ran();
00070     repeat r.Ran32();
00071     repeat r.Ran64();
00072     repeat r(52);
00073     repeat r.Integer<signed short, 3>();
00074     repeat r.Integer<3>();
00075     repeat r.Integer();
00076     repeat r.Integer<signed short>();
00077     repeat r.Integer<signed short>(52);
00078     repeat r.IntegerC<signed short>(51);
00079     repeat r.IntegerC<signed short>(1,52);
00080     repeat r.Integer(6u);
00081     repeat r.IntegerC(5u);
00082     repeat r.IntegerC(1u,6u);
00083     repeat r();
00084     repeat r(52u);
00085   }
00086   {
00087     // Functions returning random reals
00088     repeat { r.Fixed <float,  16 >(); r.Fixed <float>(); r.Fixed (); }
00089     repeat { r.FixedU<float,  16 >(); r.FixedU<float>(); r.FixedU(); }
00090     repeat { r.FixedN<float,  16 >(); r.FixedN<float>(); r.FixedN(); }
00091     repeat { r.FixedW<float,  16 >(); r.FixedW<float>(); r.FixedW(); }
00092     repeat { r.FixedS<float,  16 >(); r.FixedS<float>(); r.FixedS(); }
00093     repeat { r.FixedO<float,  16 >(); r.FixedO<float>(); r.FixedO(); }
00094     repeat { r.Float <float, 4, 2>(); r.Float <float>(); r.Float (); }
00095     repeat { r.FloatU<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatU<float>(); r.FloatU(); }
00096     repeat { r.FloatN<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatN<float>(); r.FloatN(); }
00097     repeat { r.FloatW<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatW<float>(); r.FloatW(); }
00098     repeat { r.Real<float>(); r.Real(); }
00099   }
00100   {
00101     // Functions returning other random results
00102     repeat r.Boolean();
00103     repeat r.Prob(0.5f);
00104     repeat r.Prob(2.3, 7.0);
00105     repeat r.Prob(23, 70);
00106     repeat r.Bits< 5>();
00107     repeat r.Bits<64>();
00108   }
00109   {
00110     // Normal distribution
00111     RandomLib::NormalDistribution<float> nf;
00112     RandomLib::NormalDistribution<> nd;
00113     repeat nf(r);
00114     repeat nd(r, 1.0, 2.0);
00115   }
00116   {
00117     // Exponention distribution
00118     RandomLib::ExponentialDistribution<float> ef;
00119     RandomLib::ExponentialDistribution<> ed;
00120     repeat ef(r);
00121     repeat ed(r, 2.0);
00122   }
00123   {
00124     // Discrete probabilities
00125     unsigned w[] = { 0, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 };
00126     std::vector<int> wi(13);
00127     std::vector<float> wf(13);
00128     for (int i = 0; i < 13; ++i) {
00129       wi[i] = int(w[i]);
00130       wf[i] = float(w[i]);
00131     }
00132     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel; }
00133     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(w, w + 13); }
00134     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(wi.begin(), wi.end()); }
00135     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(wi); }
00136     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel; }
00137     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(w, w + 13); }
00138     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wi); }
00139     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wf.begin(), wf.end()); }
00140     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wf); }
00141     {
00142       RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel;
00143       sel.Init(w, w + 13);
00144       sel.Init(wi.begin(), wi.end());
00145       sel.Init(wi);
00146       repeat sel(r);
00147       sel.TotalWeight();
00148       sel.MaxWeight();
00149       sel.Weight(3);
00150       sel.Choices();
00151     }
00152     {
00153       RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel;
00154       sel.Init(w, w + 13);
00155       sel.Init(wi.begin(), wi.end());
00156       sel.Init(wi);
00157       sel.Init(wf);
00158       repeat sel(r);
00159       sel.TotalWeight();
00160       sel.MaxWeight();
00161       sel.Weight(3);
00162       sel.Choices();
00163     }
00164     // Other distributions
00165     { RandomLib::LeadingZeros lz; repeat lz(r); }
00166     { RandomLib::ExponentialProb ep; repeat ep(r, 1.5f); }
00167     {
00168       // Infinite precision random numbers
00169       {
00170         RandomLib::RandomNumber<1> n;
00171         n.Init();
00172         n.Digit(r, 10);
00173         n.RawDigit(4);
00174         n.AddInteger(-2);
00175         n.Negate();
00176         n.Sign();
00177         n.Floor();
00178         n.Ceiling();
00179         n.Size();
00180         n.Range();
00181         n.Fraction<float>(r);
00182         n.Value<double>(r);
00183         RandomLib::RandomNumber<1> p;
00184         n.LessThan(r, p);
00185         std::ostringstream os;
00186         os << n;
00187       }
00188       {
00189         RandomLib::RandomNumber<32> n;
00190         n.Init();
00191         n.Digit(r, 10);
00192         n.RawDigit(4);
00193         n.AddInteger(-2);
00194         n.Negate();
00195         n.Sign();
00196         n.Floor();
00197         n.Ceiling();
00198         n.Size();
00199         n.Range();
00200         n.Fraction<float>(r);
00201         n.Value<double>(r);
00202         RandomLib::RandomNumber<32> p;
00203         n.LessThan(r, p);
00204         std::ostringstream os;
00205         os << n;
00206       }
00207       // Exact distributions
00208       { RandomLib::ExactExponential< 1> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<float >(r); }
00209       { RandomLib::ExactExponential<32> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<double>(r); }
00210       { RandomLib::ExactNormal< 1> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<float >(r); }
00211       { RandomLib::ExactNormal<32> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<double>(r); }
00212       { RandomLib::ExactPower< 1> pd; repeat pd(r,2).Value<float >(r); }
00213       { RandomLib::ExactPower<32> pd; repeat pd(r,3).Value<double>(r); }
00214       { RandomLib::InversePiProb pd; repeat pd(r); }
00215       { RandomLib::InverseEProb pd; repeat pd(r); }
00216     }
00217   }
00218   {
00219     // Setting position in sequence
00220     r.Count();
00221     r.StepCount(1000);
00222     r.Reset();
00223     r.SetCount(10000);
00224     r.SetStride(10,1);
00225     r.SetStride(5);
00226     r.GetStride();
00227     r.SetStride();
00228   }
00229   {
00230     // Other
00231     Random s(r);
00232     s = Random::Global;
00233     s == r;
00234     s != s;
00235     r.swap(s);
00236     std::swap(r, s);
00237   }
00238 }

00240 void coverage64() {
00241   typedef RandomLib::SRandom64 Random;
00242   {
00243     // Setting and examing the seed + seed management
00244     std::vector<unsigned long> v(Random::SeedVector());
00245     unsigned long w = Random::SeedWord();
00246     std::string s(Random::VectorToString(v));
00247     { Random r(v); }
00248     { Random r(v.begin(), v.end()); }
00249     int a[] = {1, 2, 3, 4};
00250     { Random r(a, a + 4); }
00251     { Random r(w); }
00252     { Random r(s); }
00253     { Random r; }
00254     Random r(0);
00255     r.Reseed(v);
00256     r.Reseed(v.begin(), v.end());
00257     r.Reseed(w);
00258     r.Reseed(s);
00259     r.Reseed();
00260     v = r.Seed();
00261     s = r.SeedString();
00262     r.Reseed(Random::VectorToString(v));
00263     r.Reseed(Random::StringToVector(s));
00264   }
00265   Random r;
00266   {
00267     // Functions returning random integers
00268     repeat r();
00269     repeat r.Ran();
00270     repeat r.Ran32();
00271     repeat r.Ran64();
00272     repeat r(52);
00273     repeat r.Integer<signed short, 3>();
00274     repeat r.Integer<3>();
00275     repeat r.Integer();
00276     repeat r.Integer<signed short>();
00277     repeat r.Integer<signed short>(52);
00278     repeat r.IntegerC<signed short>(51);
00279     repeat r.IntegerC<signed short>(1,52);
00280     repeat r.Integer(6u);
00281     repeat r.IntegerC(5u);
00282     repeat r.IntegerC(1u,6u);
00283     repeat r();
00284     repeat r(52u);
00285   }
00286   {
00287     // Functions returning random reals
00288     repeat { r.Fixed <float,  16 >(); r.Fixed <float>(); r.Fixed (); }
00289     repeat { r.FixedU<float,  16 >(); r.FixedU<float>(); r.FixedU(); }
00290     repeat { r.FixedN<float,  16 >(); r.FixedN<float>(); r.FixedN(); }
00291     repeat { r.FixedW<float,  16 >(); r.FixedW<float>(); r.FixedW(); }
00292     repeat { r.FixedS<float,  16 >(); r.FixedS<float>(); r.FixedS(); }
00293     repeat { r.FixedO<float,  16 >(); r.FixedO<float>(); r.FixedO(); }
00294     repeat { r.Float <float, 4, 2>(); r.Float <float>(); r.Float (); }
00295     repeat { r.FloatU<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatU<float>(); r.FloatU(); }
00296     repeat { r.FloatN<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatN<float>(); r.FloatN(); }
00297     repeat { r.FloatW<float, 4, 2>(); r.FloatW<float>(); r.FloatW(); }
00298     repeat { r.Real<float>(); r.Real(); }
00299   }
00300   {
00301     // Functions returning other random results
00302     repeat r.Boolean();
00303     repeat r.Prob(0.5f);
00304     repeat r.Prob(2.3, 7.0);
00305     repeat r.Prob(23, 70);
00306     repeat r.Bits< 5>();
00307     repeat r.Bits<64>();
00308   }
00309   {
00310     // Normal distribution
00311     RandomLib::NormalDistribution<float> nf;
00312     RandomLib::NormalDistribution<> nd;
00313     repeat nf(r);
00314     repeat nd(r, 1.0, 2.0);
00315   }
00316   {
00317     // Exponention distribution
00318     RandomLib::ExponentialDistribution<float> ef;
00319     RandomLib::ExponentialDistribution<> ed;
00320     repeat ef(r);
00321     repeat ed(r, 2.0);
00322   }
00323   {
00324     // Discrete probabilities
00325     unsigned w[] = { 0, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 };
00326     std::vector<int> wi(13);
00327     std::vector<float> wf(13);
00328     for (int i = 0; i < 13; ++i) {
00329       wi[i] = int(w[i]);
00330       wf[i] = float(w[i]);
00331     }
00332     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel; }
00333     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(w, w + 13); }
00334     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(wi.begin(), wi.end()); }
00335     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel(wi); }
00336     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel; }
00337     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(w, w + 13); }
00338     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wi); }
00339     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wf.begin(), wf.end()); }
00340     { RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel(wf); }
00341     {
00342       RandomLib::RandomSelect<unsigned> sel;
00343       sel.Init(w, w + 13);
00344       sel.Init(wi.begin(), wi.end());
00345       sel.Init(wi);
00346       repeat sel(r);
00347       sel.TotalWeight();
00348       sel.MaxWeight();
00349       sel.Weight(3);
00350       sel.Choices();
00351     }
00352     {
00353       RandomLib::RandomSelect<> sel;
00354       sel.Init(w, w + 13);
00355       sel.Init(wi.begin(), wi.end());
00356       sel.Init(wi);
00357       sel.Init(wf);
00358       repeat sel(r);
00359       sel.TotalWeight();
00360       sel.MaxWeight();
00361       sel.Weight(3);
00362       sel.Choices();
00363     }
00364     // Other distributions
00365     { RandomLib::LeadingZeros lz; repeat lz(r); }
00366     { RandomLib::ExponentialProb ep; repeat ep(r, 1.5f); }
00367     {
00368       // Infinite precision random numbers
00369       {
00370         RandomLib::RandomNumber<1> n;
00371         n.Init();
00372         n.Digit(r, 10);
00373         n.RawDigit(4);
00374         n.AddInteger(-2);
00375         n.Negate();
00376         n.Sign();
00377         n.Floor();
00378         n.Ceiling();
00379         n.Size();
00380         n.Range();

00382         n.Value<double>(r);
00383         RandomLib::RandomNumber<1> p;
00384         n.LessThan(r, p);
00385         std::ostringstream os;
00386         os << n;
00387       }
00388       {
00389         RandomLib::RandomNumber<32> n;
00390         n.Init();
00391         n.Digit(r, 10);
00392         n.RawDigit(4);
00393         n.AddInteger(-2);
00394         n.Negate();
00395         n.Sign();
00396         n.Floor();
00397         n.Ceiling();
00398         n.Size();
00399         n.Range();
00400         n.Fraction<float>(r);
00401         n.Value<double>(r);

00404         std::ostringstream os;
00405         os << n;
00406       }
00407       // Exact distributions
00408       { RandomLib::ExactExponential< 1> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<float >(r); }
00409       { RandomLib::ExactExponential<32> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<double>(r); }
00410       { RandomLib::ExactNormal< 1> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<float >(r); }
00411       { RandomLib::ExactNormal<32> ed; repeat ed(r).Value<double>(r); }
00412       { RandomLib::ExactPower< 1> pd; repeat pd(r,2).Value<float >(r); }
00413       { RandomLib::ExactPower<32> pd; repeat pd(r,3).Value<double>(r); }
00414       { RandomLib::InversePiProb pd; repeat pd(r); }
00415       { RandomLib::InverseEProb pd; repeat pd(r); }
00416     }
00417   }
00418   {
00419     // Setting position in sequence
00420     r.Count();
00421     r.StepCount(1000);
00422     r.Reset();
00423     r.SetCount(10000);
00424     r.SetStride(10,1);
00425     r.SetStride(5);
00426     r.GetStride();
00427     r.SetStride();
00428   }
00429   {
00430     // Other
00431     Random s(r);
00432     s = Random::Global;
00433     s == r;
00434     s != s;
00435     r.swap(s);
00436     std::swap(r, s);
00437   }

00439 
00440 int main(int, char**) {
00441   std::cout << "RandomLib Coverage Test\n";
00442   coverage32();
00443   coverage64();
00444   int retval = 0;
00445   {
00446     using namespace RandomLib;
00447     {
00448       RandomEngine<MT19937<Random_u32>,MixerMT0<Random_u32> >
00449         s("0x123,0x234,0x345,0x456");
00450       s.SetCount(999);
00451       bool pass = s() == 3460025646U;
00452       std::cout << "Check " << s.Name()
00453                 << (pass ? " passed\n" : " FAILED\n");
00454       if (!pass) retval = 1;
00455     }
00456     {
00457       RandomEngine<MT19937<Random_u64>,MixerMT0<Random_u64> >
00458         s("0x12345,0,0x23456,0,0x34567,0,0x45678,0");
00459       s.SetCount(999);
00460       bool pass = s() == 994412663058993407ULL;
00461       std::cout << "Check " << s.Name()
00462                 << (pass ? " passed\n" : " FAILED\n");
00463       if (!pass) retval = 1;
00464     }
00465     {
00466       SRandomGenerator32 s("0x1234,0x5678,0x9abc,0xdef0");
00467       s.SetCount(999);
00468       bool pass = s() == 788493625U;
00469       std::cout << "Check " << s.Name()
00470                 << (pass ? " passed\n" : " FAILED\n");
00471       if (!pass) retval = 1;
00472     }
00473     {
00474       SRandomGenerator64 s("5,4,3,2,1");
00475       s.SetCount(999);
00476       bool pass = s() == 13356980519185762498ULL;
00477       std::cout << "Check " << s.Name()
00478                 << (pass ? " passed\n" : " FAILED\n");
00479       if (!pass) retval = 1;
00480     }
00481   }
00482   return retval;
00483 }
